member.name: ID2D1Bitmap.CopyFromMemory
member.summary: Copies the specified region from memory into the current bitmap.
member.param: In the current bitmap, the rectangle to which the region specified by srcRect is copied.

The stride, or pitch, of the source bitmap stored in srcData. The stride is the byte count of a scanline (one row of pixels in memory). The stride can be computed from the following formula: pixel width * bytes per pixel + memory padding.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
